name: 7. Bouncing弹跳消by Li Feng 李峰
name_original: 7. Bouncing弹跳消by Li Feng 李峰
description:
Bouncing弹跳消

Game Instructions:游戏说明：

You have 45 seconds to play the game. The total score at the end of the game is the final score.

The bouncing ball will randomly falls from above (You have three chances to reset the bouncing ball in each game), you need to control the baffle to hit the fixed icon appears randomly on the screen to gain points.

Gain 10 points for hitting the blue icon. After 3 hits, the original icon will disappear and reappears randomly.

Gain 20 points for hitting the yellow icon. After 4 hits, the original icon will disappear and reappears randomly.

Gain 30 points for hitting the red icon. After 5 hits, the original icon will disappear and reappears randomly.

游戏开始计时，45秒后或者未接住球时游戏结束，游戏结束时的总得分为最后得分

活动球随机从上面下落（每局游戏有三次右键重置活动球的机会），游戏者左右移动挡板接球弹起，撞击随机出现在屏幕里的固定图标得分

每次撞击篮图标得10分，撞击3次后原图标消失并随机在屏幕其他位置重新出现；

每次撞击黄图标得20分，撞击4次后原图标消失并随机在屏幕其他位置重新出现；

每次撞击红图标得30分，撞击5次后原图标消失并随机在屏幕其他位置重新出现；
